data.name: Star Melody Yumemi Dreamer
data.detailed_description:
Regarding save data

Please note that the save data of the demo version will not be carried over.


Season Pass

Purchase all 12 episodes with a 10% off discount!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1796860/Star_Melody_Yumemi_Dreamer_Season_Pass


About the Game

Save the world in this Magical Girl rhythm adventure! Your bond becomes their strength.
Let's open the door to the Dreamworld together.

About the game

Kogado Studio's "Kuroneko-san Team" has created a brand new series for the first time in 10 years! Play as the Magical Girl and proceed with the game with the following three parts!

1. Adventure part

Experience the story with visual novels gameplay.


2. Command battle part

Fight against the enemy with RPG battles.


3. Rhythm game part

Perform music to purify MUMA.




The game consists of 12 episodes and will be distributed 1 episode at a time every week.

※This product contains episodes one and two out of a total of 12 episodes that are distributed individually.

Story

The story takes place in the life of an ordinary junior high school student, Yumemi Nanahoshi, who lives in Hoshimaki Town, a small town in the suburbs near the sea. In the midst of Yumemi's ordinary life, Kirara, the princess of the "Little Star," whose own planet was destroyed by a monster called "Muma."

Muma, who manipulates nightmares and eats people's souls, follows her to the earth. The only way to save everyone is for Yumemi to become a "Dreamer" and defeat Muma with the "Song of purification."

With the support of her childhood friend Kanato, Yumemi becomes a Dreamer and starts her fight against Muma today. In order to protect the peace of the earth, and to protect the dreams of everyone.

Staff

Making/IP: KOGADO STUDIO, INC. Kuroneko-san team
Director: Kuro Torikoshi
Series construction: Daisuke Tazawa (GEKKO INC.)／Pan Tachibana
Scenario supervision: Makoto Nishikawa　KOGADO STUDIO Literary section
Character design & Original art: AkkeyJIN
Graphics supervision: KOGADO STUDIO Digital art Dept.
Movie:yo-yu (feat. works)
Voice recording & Cooperation: STUDIO MAUSU

Music

Music production: Bit Groove Promotion

Main Song "Eternal Glow"
Lyrics: YOFFY（Psychic Lover）
Music: YOFFY（Psychic Lover）
Arrangement: Kenichiro Oishi
Vocalist: Emi Uema
Music by: Mashup Entertainment

Ending themesong "Yume no naka no senritsu"
Lyrics:: Ayaka Ota
Music: Hisao Sasaki
Arrangement: Hisao Sasaki
Vocalist: Ayaka Ota
Music by: Mashup Entertainment

featured song "Shiny☆Shiny DREAMER!!"
Lyrics: Ayaka Ota
Music: Yoru.
Arrangement: Yoru.

featured song "Trinity Material"
Lyrics: Emi Uema
Music: IMAJO（Psychic Lover）
Arrangement: IMAJO（Psychic Lover）

Cast voice actor

Kanato Kamio: Shuichiro Umeda

Yumemi Nanahoshi: Akane Fujita
Ayumu Kazahari: Marika Kono

Kirara star: Ayano Shibuya
Comet: Aya Yamane
Meteo star: Hikaru Akao

Tsukina Amano: Atsumi Tanezaki
Kotose Tsujiura: Asuka Nishi
Kou Mikado: Genta Nakamura
Suzune Kurachi: Maria Naganawa

Envyrose: Riho Sugiyama
Greedoll: Aya Suzaki
Belpheus: Kengo Kawanishi

data.short_description: Save the world in this Magical Girl rhythm adventure! Your bond becomes their strength.Let's open the door to the Dreamworld together.
data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 2GHz以上
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720、フルカラー表示が可能な環境
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Visual Novel with mature theme, some nudity and sexual content.
